Item.title: Careers
Item.body:
WORK WITH US:
Join us and work with us. If you are innovative, driven, and are looking for an opportunity to work with one of the best addresses’ on the world-wide-web, this is the place for you. We are always looking for out-of-the-box smart problem solvers with analytical skills who are stimulated and motivated to change the world and make it an easier/better place. We value big ideas, creative thinking, analytical skills, and teamwork. We invite you to come join our team that is enthused to connect the world like never before. If you think you’ve got what it takes, please send us your resume.
Open Positions: ▪ Ad sales executives ▪ Marketing executives ▪ Web Developers (java, php, C#, SQL, Oracle) ▪ Web Designers (UI) ▪ Database Administrators ▪ Graphic Designers
